org.apache.spark.util.logging

Class TimeBasedRollingPolicy

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.util.logging.TimeBasedRollingPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging, RollingPolicy

    public class TimeBasedRollingPolicy
extends Object
implements RollingPolicy, Logging
    Defines a RollingPolicy by which files will be rolled over at a fixed interval.
